subject: Order #SSN5337
description_text:
Dear Simsoon Team,

I want to ask, when i can expect my Order to arrieve ?

I know about the much holidays at last, but i Hope the express Delivery
 gets faster than the normal Way.

I Hope you have a Good Time

Kindle reguards

Chris Bühler

conversations.body_text: Hi Free Pianist,    We apologize for the delay. The shipment is expected to arrive at our German warehouse on the 12th, at which time we will be able to ship your order. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Hi,
Thanks for the Information.
So i See the linear Motors are on the way, but the Pedals are still
 confirmed, but Not on the way at the Moment.

The goods were supposed to arrive at the German warehouse two days ago.but
the Pedals are still Not Shopping at the Moment
I would like to inquire whether the pedals will be delivered to me this
week. I mean, I paid for express delivery so that the goods would arrive as
quickly as possible and not after three weeks.

Best reguards

Chris Bühler
service@simsonn.com

Hi Free Pianist,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
